# placeholderItem

**Instance Property**

The placeholder object you specified at initialization time.

## Declaration

```swift
var placeholderItem: Any? { get }
```

## Accessing the provider attributes

- **item**: Generates and returns the actual data-bearing object.
- **activityType**: The type of the activity object that is expecting the data.
